about_the_game:
Start an unforgettable adventure where you, armed with the unique ability to poop endlessly, battle foes in a medieval realm. Brace yourself for wild humor, thrilling fights, intricate puzzles, and a meticulously hand-drawn world. A quirky companion fish accompanies you on this epic journey!


Enter the tale of a humble medieval court worker whose chance encounter with a Goldfish transforms into an endless pooping predicament. Uncover the mysteries behind this unusual power, rescue the princess, confront evil spirits, and thwart a black magician. Along the way, master your superpower, combat enemies with unconventional methods, and decipher ancient riddles in diverse landscapes.


Engage in dynamic battles wielding both melee weapons and, more uniquely, your own excrement. Progress through the narrative to unlock new types of "ammunition" and inventive ways to utilize them. Leverage your Goldfish companion and infinite pooping prowess to overcome challenging puzzles and progress through the platforming adventure.


Every character in the game contributes to a rich, interconnected narrative, where past events shape the future. Encounter vibrant allies, each with a unique backstory, while facing diverse enemies across multiple worlds. Your loyal goldfish companion accompanies you throughout, offering both companionship and assistance in overcoming the dangers that lie ahead.


Tailor your combat style by enhancing your battle skills, and explore the fascinating versatility of your unique ability. Unleash your excrement not just in combat but also to unravel mysteries, discover shortcuts, and unveil secret rooms. The enigmatic doctor introduces new transports, adding an element of curiosity to your journey as you strive to understand their origin.

  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 | Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 | AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Embark on an epic adventure as a hero blessed with the unique power of infinite pooping. Navigate through a captivating blend of action-platformer, metroidvania, and puzzles in a charming hand-drawn 2D world. Unleash your heroic prowess in this quirky and entertaining game!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
